SCRIPT.MSCRI: : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" cd /d &UC4RB_OSB_HOME#\tools\configjar SET ERROR=%ERRORLEVEL% IF %ERROR% EQU 0 ( call setenv.bat ) SET ERROR=%ERRORLEVEL% IF %ERROR% EQU 0 ( &UC4RB_RUN_CMD# ) ELSE ( echo "ERROR: Unable to set OSB environment." ) SET ERROR=%ERRORLEVEL% IF %ERROR% NEQ 0 ( echo "ERROR: Unable to execute the command." ) : CASE "UNIX" cd &UC4RB_OSB_HOME#/tools/configjar error=$? if [ "$error" -eq 0 ] then . ./setenv.sh error=$? else echo "Invalid OSB Home directory" fi if [ "$error" -eq 0 ] then &UC4RB_RUN_CMD# error=$? else echo "Unable to set OSB environment" fi if [ "$error" -ne 0 ] then echo "ERROR: Unable to execute the command." fi : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
